pro.zackpollard.telegrambot.api.menu

Class AbstractInlineMenuBuilder<T extends AbstractInlineMenuBuilder>

  • java.lang.Object
    • pro.zackpollard.telegrambot.api.menu.AbstractInlineMenuBuilder<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Implementing class
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    InlineMenuBuilder, SubInlineMenuBuilder

    public abstract class AbstractInlineMenuBuilder<T extends AbstractInlineMenuBuilder>
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract menu builder, shared methods between sub menus and head menus. Supports rows and user predicates.
    Author:
    Mazen Kotb
